decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm while disrupting the opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will. It also utilizes tempo plays with cards like Daze and Fatal Push to maintain control of the game. The inclusion of reanimation spells like Reanimate adds another layer of versatility to the deck, allowing for explosive plays. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes powerful lands like Underground Sea and Wasteland. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck aims to control the game by playing disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will while also maintaining pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Brazen Borrower, Murktide Regent, and Baleful Strix. The deck excels at tempo plays, disrupting the opponent's game plan while pushing its own agenda forward. By efficiently using its resources and powerful interaction spells, the deck can disrupt the opponent's strategy while applying pressure to win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using cards like Swords to Plowshares, Dress Down, and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also aims to quickly bring out Phyrexian Dreadnought, a powerful creature with a downside that can be mitigated by sacrificing it with Doorkeeper Thrull or Consign to Memory. Through card draw and manipulation with Brainstorm and Ponder, as well as utilizing Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, the deck seeks to find its key combo pieces and counter any threats from the opponent while establishing board control through Wasteland.

This deck focuses on quickly getting creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruption elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect its game plan. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and filtering, while Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty are powerful threats that can quickly end the game. The deck aims to combo off and win before the opponent has a chance to react, utilizing a strong mix of creatures and spells to achieve victory.

The deck revolves around quickly generating mana with cards like Dark Ritual and Lion's Eye Diamond to cast multiple spells in a single turn, which triggers the Storm mechanic of Tendrils of Agony to deal lethal damage to the opponent. The deck also aims to reload its hand with Echo of Eons and Galvanic Relay to continue its combo. Veil of Summer and Gaea's Will protect the combo from disruption, while Burning Wish provides flexibility in finding key combo pieces from the sideboard. The deck is aiming to win the game in one explosive turn.
